response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $15,000 to you. I understand the importance of making a fair deal, and thus, I am offering you the chance to own this exceptional item at an exclusive price of $14,500. This special offer is designed to ensure you receive the best value while allowing me to maximize the return on my investment. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with this transaction.", "product_price": 14500}
